name: startup-incubation-app
description: Complete MERN Startup Incubation Management Application

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run prod --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"

author: SIMS Team
